item.title: LinkedIn Social Selling Index
item.description: What Is The LinkedIn Social Selling Index? LinkedIn Social Selling Index is an index that measures an individual’s extent of personal branding and social influence on LinkedIn. LinkedIn itself describes the Social Selling Index as first-of-its-kind measure of a company’s or individual’s adaptation of the four pillars of selling on LinkedIn, based on a scale of 0 to 100. The score of 100 is a combination of 4 pillars which each contribute 25 points each, namely:
